title: Why the fuck do squishy junglers gank Fiora when she already has a Hydra?
body:
Look, I don't get this at all, I have seen Elise players, Lee Sin players, Udyr players, Shaco players, etc, that gank me whenever I have a Hydra and end up giving me a free kill because two Qs, an autoattack, and one ult from Fiora is enough to get a kill off of a squishy jungler, especially since with the jungle nowadays junglers will usually be behind in level which also adds on to them dying easily as they don't have enough stats to survive Fiora.

My confusion comes from why do people do this all the time and why do they repeat it?

I was just in a match and this Lee Sin camped me yet he died the 3/4 times he ganked me, that's not too great considering you're feeding a feast or famine champion and holy shit a fed Fiora is going to be the end of your team if you continue to repeat a mediocre process, which it was, I literally raped the enemy team for the rest of the match to where they couldn't do anything.

I mean do people do this in higher tiers or is it just the ELO I'm in because seeing this and I'm kind of like "Why would you do that?"

And then there's the part where MY jungler is the one doing this idiotic strategy of "lol let's feed a feast or famine champion where we COULD kill her but it wouldn't be worth anyways," and I am literally just wondering what is going on inside their head.
